Name: Wane Loafers
Description:
Seems to be able to obtain higher Intellect attributes.

[The advanced attributes of this gear will not include luck]
Description2$english: A classic outfit set designed specifically for reconnaissance, made from comfortable and durable materials, easy to move in and beloved by adventurers.

NeedMaterial.Name: Refined Hard Leather
NeedMaterial.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Fish resin-cured leather made from sanded and stitched animal hides for enhanced flexibility.

recipes.Name: Refined Hard Leather
recipes.Des: Fish resin-cured leather made from sanded and stitched animal hides for enhanced flexibility.

NeedMaterial.Name: Coarse-grained Animal Hides
NeedMaterial.Description: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.

NeedMaterial.Name: Alum
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: White natural alum serves as a key raw material in the production of deodorants and leather tanning agents.

NeedMaterial.Name: Resin
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Versatile in application, it is primarily used to harden and bond leather with lasting strength.

NeedMaterial.Name: Rubber
NeedMaterial.Description: An alchemical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A resilient essence distilled from natural resins, the wellspring of elasticity and protection.

NeedMaterial.Name: Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough alloy shards, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 40 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
